revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=ADI Engineering |model=Pronghorn SBC-250 |revision=-RTR |est_release_date=07/2007 |is_manuf=No |type=CPE, wireless router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP425;PRIXP425ABD; |cpu1_cspeed=533 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F128J3D75 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2-75D |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, Compact Flash, |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, J5 |serial=yes,, console port (RJ45),, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_module=EnGenius NMP-8602 PLUS |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5414 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM5241 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=1 to 4 Clock Buffer;Integrated Device Technology;ICS551;;1;,,, Quad Differential Comparator;Texas Instruments;LM339A;;1;,,, Current Mode PWM Controller;Maxim Integrated Products;MAX5014;;1; ,,, 2A PWM Step-Down Regulator;Maxim Integrated Products;MAX1951;;1;,,, 5V, Voltage Monitoring Microprocessor Supervisor;Analog Devices;ADM708;;1;,,, 3V to 6V, 6A Synchronous Buck PWM Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS54610;;1;,,, 3V to 5.5V Multichannel RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;SN65C3232;;1;,,, Hex Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC07A;;1; |stock_boot=Redboot;3.40; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.26.3; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:08:A2 }} :[ftp://www.fament.com/wisprouter/eje/wisp-router.com/www/download/eBayDataSheets/SBC250.pdf Product Brief] {{â€¢}} [http://site.microcom.us/PronghornSBC_Hardware_Manual.pdf Hardware Manual]
